website_summaries.verdict: This pop-up trundle fits under nearly any bed and will raise the the height of a regular bed making it easier for use by adults.
pros: Offers the benefits of a roll-away trundle
Raises to a normal bed height
Angled rails help hold the mattress on the frame
Bed can be rolled anywhere in the room while in the popped-up position
Has a locking bar to hold the bed in a popped-up position
cons: Folds to 4.5-inches, which is higher than other trundles, but will still fit with a mattress under many bed frames

Now my growing teenager can still have a big bed and sleepover room. perfect. Using an 8"mattress on top, making it 12-1/2" when collapsed. customer_reviews.text: such a cool item to expand our daybed for guests. i absolutely love it and while there were no instructions, it was very easy to figure out. make sure you pull the lever up in the middle so both sides pop up evenly. customer_reviews.title: One for the ages!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very heavy duty product. My Dad was a furniture dealer when I was a small child, over 60 years ago. I recall that he sold the Leggett & Platt hide-away bed in his store. They appear to be the same design and quality that I remember. When my bed arrived the box that it was in was nearly completely torn away but there wasn't a scratch or dent on the bed. I recommend it......
customer_reviews.author: Richard in Oklahoma

product_meta.title: Leggett & Platt Pop-Up 39-Inch Link Spring Trundle Bed with Dual Gravity Locks, Twin
product_meta.description: The link spring Pop-Up Trundle is spring-loaded to safely "pop" open when needed. This locking spring automatically lifts the unit into the "up" position and locks into place. Gravity locks ensures stability when the trundle is in the "up" position and allows for safe, controlled closing for storage. 2" plastic wheels provides mobility. (2) 1" cross arms provides maximum support. This unit measures 72" (L) x 38.5" (W) and can adjust from 4.5" to 15.25" in height. The Leggett & Platt Pop-Up Trundle comes with a 1-Year Limited Warranty against manufacturing defects. Leggett & Platt Inc. is an industry leader in the production of adjustable bases, fashionable beds, bedding support, and top of bed textiles. By keeping a close eye on the design community and other fashion and decorating sources, Leggett & Platt stays on top of the trends and knows the right mix of finishes, innovative designs, and technology to continually provide quality crafted products at an exceptional value.
